attributes.action: help improve the awareness and funding towards diagnosis and treatment for Lyme disease.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That funding and resources be urgently made available and used to improve
all aspects of the diagnosis, treatment, prevention, monitoring, public
awareness and research of Lyme disease and its associated tick-borne
infections, in order to improve the poor clinical outcome for people with
these diseases in the UK.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "help improve the awareness and funding towards diagnosis and treatment for Lyme disease."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15023.asp

Prime Minister's Office
